statements: DELETE FROM supplier_performance_metrics WHERE supplier_id = 1 AND delivery_performance > 0.8
DELETE FROM supplier_performance_metrics WHERE supplier_name LIKE '%Corp%'
DELETE FROM supplier_performance_metrics WHERE vendor_name = 'ABC Corp';
DELETE FROM negotiation_terms WHERE vendor_name = 'XYZ Ltd';
DELETE FROM supplier_performance_metrics WHERE supplier_id = 123 AND delivery_performance_score < 0.8
DELETE FROM negotiation_terms WHERE payment_terms = 'Net 30' AND contract_duration > 1
DELETE FROM products WHERE supplier_id IN (SELECT supplier_id FROM suppliers WHERE performance_rating < 3);
DELETE FROM PurchaseHistory WHERE supplier_id IN (SELECT supplier_id FROM Supplier WHERE supplier_location='London');
DELETE FROM SupplierContacts WHERE supplier_id IN (SELECT supplier_id FROM Supplier WHERE supplier_name LIKE 'ABC%');
DELETE FROM PerformanceMetrics WHERE supplier_id NOT IN (SELECT supplier_id FROM Supplier);
